name: Pokémon Pinball
description: Discover a whole new way to collect Pokémon - by playing pinball!Hit the targets with your Poke Ball to catch and evolve Pokémon.The better you do, the more rare Pokémon you'll find!Every Pokémon you catch is automatically recorded in your Pokedex - see if you catch all 150!Some Pokémon appear only on the Red Field or only on the Blue Field, so you'll have to play them both to catch 'em all!
